scripts.api-run: firebase use staging && firebase functions:config:set $(python functions/envreader.py dev) && firebase emulators:start
scripts.spa-run: firebase use staging && pushd ./public && ng serve && popd
scripts.prod-deploy: pushd ./public && ng build --prod && popd && firebase functions:config:set $(python functions/envreader.py prod) &&  firebase deploy -P prod
scripts.stage-deploy: pushd ./public && ng build --configuration staging && popd && firebase functions:config:set $(python functions/envreader.py staging) && firebase deploy -P staging
